ResearchProjectDef.label: heavy shield making
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create heavy scuta shields typically associated with legionnaires.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->reinvigorated the tradition of heavy shield crafting, providing unmatched protection to those who hold the line
subject_gerund->forging the scuta shields, the steadfast guardians of the legionnaires

ResearchProjectDef.label: legionary armaments
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft tents, javelins, spathas and daggers, constituting towards the legionary armory.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->mastered the fabrication of javelins, spathas, and daggers, ensuring the legion's versatility and readiness in battle
subject_gerund->equipping the legions with a diverse armory for conquest and defense

ResearchProjectDef.label: legionary armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create heavy armor of legionaries, capable of withstanding a high degree of sharp damage.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->crafted heavy armor that turns warriors into indomitable forces on the battlefield, capable of withstanding the fiercest strikes
subject_gerund->donning the legionnaires in armor that weaves invincibility with the threads of war

ResearchProjectDef.label: centurion armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Smith suits of centurion armor, excellent for leading men into heroic battles.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->smithed suits of centurion armor, imbuing leaders with both protection and a distinguished presence
subject_gerund->clothing the ranks of leadership in armor befitting their valor and virtue

ResearchProjectDef.label: scorpion
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct scorpions, a portable field artillery piece which doubles as a semi-automatic heavy crossbow.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->engineered scorpions, merging the precision of a crossbow with the destructive force of field artillery
subject_gerund->unleashing the lethal precision of ancient war machines upon the modern battlefield

ResearchProjectDef.label: beacons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build large wooden pyres, that when lit on fire are guaranteed to summon friendly reinforcements.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->constructed large wooden pyres, a signal to the skies that calls forth allies to the battlefield
subject_gerund->binding the fates of allies with flames that guide them to the fray
